text:
I TOLD YOU JUSTIN WAS MAKING BACKROOM DEALS WITH DEVELOPERS.

BUT YOU DIDN'T LISTEN!

BIBA is known for their purges, and yours truly was given the boot! ME! Like some kind of scruffy apartment-dweller transient!

Well, why should I have all the fun? You should get involved too!

If you're still a member of the BIBA group and see something worth sharing, let me know!

Why on earth was the elimination of exclusionary zoning which prevented one-third of Alexandria from housing more than one single family per plot coupled with the issue of affordable housing?

Restricting the housing supply has got NOTHING to do with housing affordability!

Why does the City Council feel that everyone should be able to live in Alexandria?

The City needs to fix our existing problems (like people trying to live in Alexandria) before creating new ones (like allowing people to live in Alexandria)!
The ink isn’t dry on z4h and we are already seeing density double on the avenue. These cows are clearly not related #justinwilsonsalexandria #mooplex

I oppose Zoning For Housing because it doesn't make housing affordable according to the rule that my silent generation parents used to buy their first house!

And besides, these 25-35 year olds *don't even like home ownership*! If they did, then why are they all in apartments?!

(Filthy transients.)
Yes, exactly, you get it! We're totally being oppressed!

The YIMBYs are far-left! And also funded by the Koch brothers and Peter Thiel!

This is an internally consistent world view!
Smug lonely transient YIMBYs "celebrating". Total clowns!
I demand Sleepy Aguirre send me the first text message!
The herd just fell in line behind one openly corrupt sociopath with immense political ambitions!
Put on your law suits everybody, it's lawyerin' time!
I don't think it worked...
If at first you don't succeed, flip the table!
They have no backbone and cannot be trusted!!!
You called?
Justin Wilson hoodwinks everyone once again!
Give me what I want or I'll sue!
Bagley's dangerous thought patterns will destroy the environment!
Look, a YIMBY! So scruffy!
Such nauseating drama from radical leftist Mr. YIMBY McPike!
He's mansplaining!

What a MESS!

Extremely SLOPPY.

OUTRAGEOUS

Too many "Alexandria" voters are just passing through!

Only the landed gentry should be given the franchise!

Where are the chain gangs to clean up the filth?!

Thanks, Justin!!1

We gathered together yesterday to make the bold statement that Zoning For Housing will not correct the injustices of a more than a century of racist housing policy.

Look at this diverse group of local residents who say so!
The Mayor forwarding a link to an article with the comment "FYI" is far beyond the worst I had imagined and I had imagined some rather bad things.
I'm being attacked by scruffy young men!

If the wicked Council passes these zoning changes, the value of all the improvements to my land will immediately be worthless!

I won't be able to sell my $1.5 million home to fund my retirement somewhere else where I won't have to suffer the consequences of my voting!

The YIMBYs aren't real Alexandrians like us! They're just a conservative billionaire libertarians conspiracy!

(Please ignore that the Coalition for a Livable Alexandria used a Koch group to find participants for our anti-ZFH survey.)

I don't understand how people with money and land could support a change in policy to help people who don't have money and land.

What have they drunk?
Mayor Justin Wilson is supporting violent drag races in the streets of our fair city! Just like the timeline and scope of Zoning for Housing, it's 2 Fast and 2 Furious!

The Democratic city council is in a conspiracy with YIMBYs, Peter Thiel, and Charles Koch to build an apartment building! 😡

WAKE UP!
Our endangered single-family housing only occupies 12% of the city! Don't listen to desperate YIMBY lies!

SPANK THE MAYOR

SPANK THE COUNCIL

SPANK! 👏 SPANK! 👏 SPANK!
Reminder: Mayor Wilson doesn't just have contempt for long-time residents and veterans—he has contempt for EVERYONE.

Justin Wilson and the council have created the most rampant discrimination I've ever seen!

Improving the bus system and putting in bike lanes?! The old South never created anything like this!

These young complainers didn't have to move here if they wanted something else!

They've got no right to tell us that we have no right to tell our next-door neighbor want they can or can't build on their land!

Zoning for Housing won't help affordability! It will make it worse!

All these unaffordable single-family homes will only get more unaffordable if we replace them with affordable duplexes!

This whole YIMBY thing is just a Koch-fueled conspiracy by this @@2433 guy!

Doesn't the evil Justin Wilson know this guy will try to steal the trains?!

They are all just ageist, ableist, astroturfers!

Wake up sheeple!!1
Look at all this danger! We gotta pool our money to file a lawsuit against this!
These road safety projects to protect pedestrians and cyclists are literally killing me!
City council has no authority to pass laws I don't like! I'm gonna sue!

Where do I even begin?!

bsky.app/profile/biba...

Don't like it in Alexandria?

Move!

You'll only find us in one of three places:

1) our enormous single family home in an R20 zone
2) the office
3) inside our cars
Justin Wilson's socialist utopia will squeeze carebears, unicorns, and rainbows in this real-life game of frogger and grand theft auto.
Tall buildings cause rain—wake up sheeple! #StopJustinWilsonsRainDance
This traffic is out of control, and Justin Wilson is to blame!
You can't trust those dot-eye-ohh websites. I learned all about it at University!

There are too many people coming to Old Town to enjoy themselves—it's completely inhospitable!

Takes the likes of a Justin Wilson to make that happen!
Weak, pathetic Wrong Way Wilson. Doing things because "the Feds made me" and "my wife made me". UNACCEPTABLE.
Some cute kids you got there. Would be a shame if something happened to them!
This meal just cost me $78 in Old Town. This is why Alexandrians think Justin Wilson is terrible

Alexandria doesn't need more housing!

If we keep building so much housing, then the price of housing might drop! 😱

alexandrialivingmagazine.com/news/breakin...
Teach your kids an important lesson: always unquestioningly submit to the state security apparatus!
What is Justin Wilson doing to prevent crimes that are happening in *clicks on article link* Connecticut?
Mayor 🤡 will replace the century-old equivalent of a house you could buy at IKEA with multi-family housing. Travesty!

Repeat after me:

People 👏 are 👏 pollution!

The city is restricting what can be built, keeping rents high!

(Don't think too hard about *what* the city does to keep rents high, just go out and complain about zoning reform.)

The city lowered the speed limit on Seminary Road, and it's more dangerous than ever!

If we let them add red lights, stop signs, or speed bumps, it would be a massacre!
Let's enumerate some of Alexandria's equally serious problems!
Lord, deliver us from bike lanes!

Can you believe it?! The *audacity* of Mayor Wilson to attend an event!

Alexandria burns and Mayor Wilson just goes to events!
Thank Mayor Speed Bump and his bicycle lobby!

It's your civic duty to throw any scooters you find into the trash!

(Ya know, if you've got the upper body strength to lift 25 pounds.)
Legalizing duplexes is classic fascism! It's got a punitive quality about it!
Justin Wilson supports BASTARDIZATION of American citizenship!
And just who is paying for these steering wheel locks, hmm?!

Unsafe, unlicensed, tax-dodging scooter-riders are getting valet parking and making all of us *deal with it*!

Diverse families with gender-normative bicycles are weaving in-and-out of traffic with wild abandon!

How many tax payer dollars, and WHY?!

Justin Wilson isn't doing *anything* about affordable housing! He just wants to turn a little bit of housing into more housing, thus increasing the housing supply and creating a more competitive real estate market. He couldn't care less.

Justin Wilson personally to blame for Hyundai/Kia corporation's lousy security that enabled criminals across America to steal cars with a USB charging cable.

He's turning this city into a ***hole!
No, we must do more!
If we can't stop developers with byzantine zoning codes, we'll just bring baseless lawsuits until they decide it's not worth it!

In Justin Wilson's Alexandria, start your day with a carjacking and end it with a robbery!

Was this what you people wanted when you voted for ZEALOTS?

Alexandria city staff propose a surprisingly reasonable zoning reform which will barely create any new housing.

BIBA is pleased!

(But no new housing is still better! Only people infected with the woke mind virus would want more housing—it's just performative messaging!)
Free buses = "high school thugs"

BIBA: "Let's follow Paris's lead!"

Also BIBA: "Alexandria is NOT Paris!"
Divisive Mayor Justin Wilson is calling us racists because we don't support his plan to reform an explicitly racist zoning code! How dare he?!
ALL of the "zoning for housing" events are at expensive hotels!
How dare Lord of the Manor Justin Wilson locate these community meetings in just the sort of places we would insist on having them?!

A new pro-development Alexandria newsletter is published on the internet. 

Do you need to exorcise or burn your computer? We consult with local mystics
The evil Council is being funded by outside money and supported by their local lackeys who were promised protection from the inevitable destruction of Alexandria! Wake up, sheeple!
The city's plans say NOTHING about reducing traffic delays!
Nobody bikes on these streets high-traffic without bike lanes, therefore we definitely don't need to add bike lanes!

🎶 Nothing really matters, anyone can see 🎶
🎶 Nothing really matters 🎶
🎶 Nothing really matters to Justin Wilson and his gaaang 🎶

The Mayor's goal is to turn this city into a slum, and he is being amazingly successful! There is a cabal of politicians, bankers, and developers who mapped it all out!

Some say there are too many conspiracy theories in this group, but I know it's true! This city will be gone!
When will Justin Wilson take action against this most terrible of crimes?!
This office building constructed in 1977 is a jewel in the crown of Alexandria! We have to stop developers from destroying it!

My dear colleague was killed when an SUV hit him on his e-bike.

This is the fault of Mayor Justin Wilson and his refusal to ban e-bikes!
But it could be so much worse than this!

Is this a duplicitous duplex pretending to be a magnificent McMansion?

Pretty sus...

Once again, despicable Mayor Justin Wilson and his Crooked Council is giving our community the Bird by personally dropping e-scooters in the middle of our sidewalks!

It's all because of his muscular advocacy!

This is what he wants!

Cars are always hitting that dumb pedestrian island.

What a waste of taxpayer money!

If the cars just hit the pedestrians instead, it would be a lot easier to clean up!

Multi-family housing built in and among single family homes?

In Del Ray?

Outrageous!
And let me reiterate, this isn't about party lines!
Won't somebody think of the McMansion owners?!

Lab leak hypothesis? Forget it!

COVID-19 was the brainchild of Mayor Justin Wilson, who will stop and nothing to ruin Alexandria. He's definitely to blame for the global pandemic that ushered in an era of mass work-from-home, leading to the gutting of the commercial real estate market.
Justin Wilson Personally Responsible for All Crime in Alexandria During Nationwide Surge in Crime
It's us, the Alexandria residents, versus the jack-booted, wet-behind-the-ears ideologues, wed to special interests and developers!

They've approved 49 ADUs in Alexandria in 2 years, and this one is renting for $3,000?!

What a scam! Surely 49 ADUs is more than enough for every firefighter, teacher, and policeman to rent for $1,500 or less!

Just goes to show you what *liars* they all are!
We should not have Del Ray imposed upon us!
The mayor is a *landlord*! You can't trust him! He's just trying to build more luxury condos for him and his other landlord pals!
Alexandria isn't Mayberry!

Koch-funded, astro-turfing brats!

Put all the YIMBY's names on a list!

How can anyone think this is ok?!

That is disgusting!
